title.rendered: JSAUX Lightning iPhone Charger Cable, [Apple MFi Certified] 1.8M/6ft Nylon Braided Lead USB Fast Charging Cable Cord…

content.rendered:
(*7*)

Q1: Is this cable Apple MFi-certified?

A: The iPhone charger cable we promote is a MFi-certified Lightning cable. You can log in to the official Apple MFi Licensed Accessories(mfi·apple·com) and search our model “JSAUX” to verify.

Q2: Why does the cellphone get sizzling when it is charging?

A: This is regular, as a result of the cellphone will generate some warmth when it’s charging. However, the principle causes for the warmth are as follows:

1. The charging velocity will probably be sooner when the cellphone energy is low, the wall charger will output 9V excessive voltage, and the cellphone will generate warmth due to the voltage changing course of.

2. There are too many packages working within the background of the cellphone, inflicting the cellphone to run at a excessive load and generate extra warmth.

Recommendations:

1. Clean up the working program of the cellphone with excessive energy consumption within the background in time.

2. Don’t play the cellphone whereas the cellphone is charged with low energy, in any other case the cellphone will probably be in a excessive load state.

About the error message “This accessory may not be supported by device”:

The message would seem in the event you had been utilizing a non-Apple wall charger or in poor contact, however even in case you are utilizing an Apple accent, the error may occur for the firmware downside with iOS.

After evaluation, the causes of this downside would be the following:

  • Device lightning port incorporates impurities resembling fiber and particles, leading to poor contact.
  • The voltage of the wall charger is just too low or unstable, leading to inadequate energy provide.
  • The lightning finish is corroded/stained, leading to poor contact.
  • Circuit logic issues/system issues with charging gear.
  • The chip or mainboard of the cable is broken.

You can strive the next options:

  • You can use a pushpin to scrub out the pocket lint or particles from the charging port.
  • Wipe the Lightning finish with a tissue to take away filth and oxidation marks on the lightning finish.
  • Use the unique charger or MFi approved charger, as a result of some laptop computer USB output ports might have inadequate energy output.

Note:

iPad Pro 12.9” Gen3 (2018) and iPad Pro 11” (2018) solely has a USB Type-C port, so this USB A to Lightning Cable will not suitable with them.

If it nonetheless cannot repair the issue, please discover us, we’ll clear up your issues ASAP.

(*8*)

(*5*)

Upgarded C89 MFi Certified Terminal:

  • Use the newest C89 Apple terminal
  • C89 terminal is extra sturdy and steady than authentic C48.
  • Ensure that you just and your units are secure whereas charging.
Compatibility List:

  • iPhone 11 / XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus i
  • iPhone 6S / 6S Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / SE / 5S / 5C / 5 i
  • iPad Air / Air 2 / Air 2013 i
  • iPad Mini / Mini 2 / Mini 3 /Mini 4 i
  • iPad (4th Generation) i
  • iPad Pro 12.9″ (Gen1) / 12.9″ (Gen2) / 10.5″ / 9.7″i
  • iPod Touch fifth and sixth Generation i
  • iPod Nano seventh Generation

New Improved Apple C89 lightning connector

  • MFI Certified
  • Fast Charging
  • Sturdy and Durable
  • Safe and Reliable

Read more

(*6*)

Apple MFi Certified Lightning Cable

Original 8 Pin connector with a lightning finish. Enjoy lightning-quick information syncing and charging. MFi licensed by Apple themselves to supply superior peace of thoughts. Use with any of your Apple units with no security or information issues.

Nylon Tangle-free Design

  • Strong navy fiber, probably the most versatile, highly effective and sturdy materials, make tensile power elevated by 200%.
  • Premium nylon braided provides extra sturdiness and tangle free with 15000+ bend lifespan.

Perfect 6ft – Enjoy Free Life

With the 6ft size, you possibly can lie on the sofa or couch and use your units when you are charging on the similar time.

Read more

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
[Apple MFi Certified]: Original MFi chip and authentic 8 Pin connector with a lightning finish, authorised for CE, RoHS and FCC certification, guarantee secure charging on your Apple units
[Perfect Compatibility]: This MFi licensed iPhone charger cable is full suitable with iPhone XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / 7 Plus / 7 / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / 5s / 5c / 5, iPad Pro / iPad Air / Air 2 / iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 4 / iPad 4th gen, iPod Touch / iPod Nano seventh gen and many others., help quick charging (2.4A) and syncing. NOTE: iPad Pro 2018(12.9″Gen3)/iPad Pro 11″ solely has a USB Type-C port, so this USB-A to Lightning Cable will not suitable with it
[Military Grade Material]: Strong navy fibre, probably the most versatile, highly effective and sturdy materials, makes tensile power elevated by 200%. Special Strain Relief design, can bear 10000+ bending take a look at. Premium nylon braided Lightning cable provides extra sturdiness and tangle free
[Ideal 1.8M]: With the 1.8M size, you possibly can lie on the sofa or couch and use your units when you are charging on the similar time. And you should use freely in your bed room, workplace and even within the backseat of your automobile
[18-Month Warranty]: We present this 1.8M(1Pack) Nylon Braided Lightning iPhone Charger Cable with 18-Month guarantee and 24/7 customer support, if in case you have any questions, we’ll resolve your difficulty inside 24 hours
